Text: Re Resume of Carla Di Castro Cc We have many Associates that we have to place within business units Thereafter if there are additional hiring needs we will consider her resume Regards Shannon Vince J Kaminski PM To Shannon CT cc Vince J CT Subject Re Resume of Carla Di Castro Shannon I realize that the program is full If I find a group interested in her would you consider reinviting her Vince Shannon Rodgers PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Resume of Carla Di Castro Vince Thank you for forwarding the resume of Carla Di Castro Currently our Summer Associate Internship program is full I have responded to Carla to inform her of the programs status Regards Shannon
